class DSU:
  def __init__(self):
    self.parent = {}
    self.rank = {}

  def find(self, x):
    if x not in self.parent:
      # new node
      self.parent[x] = x
      self.rank[x] = 0
      
    if self.parent[x] != x:
      # path compression
      self.parent[x] = self.find(self.parent[x])
    return self.parent[x]

  def union(self, x, y):
    root_x = self.find(x)
    root_y = self.find(y)
  
    if root_x != root_y:
      if self.rank[root_x] < self.rank[root_y]:
        root_x, root_y = root_y, root_x 

      self.parent[root_y] = root_x

      if self.rank[root_x] == self.rank[root_y]:
        self.rank[root_x] += 1
      return True
    return False
